q: Watch: David Letterman on His Heart Surgery Chuck Ludlam and his wife Paula Hirshoff say the Peace Corps has lost its way since its founding by JFK 50 years ago. We're sad about it but we're also angry about it, Ludlam told ABC News,`` because the people in these countries need our help. Kelsey Grammer , 55, told David Letterman on his show last month that he plans to marry Walsh sometime in February. The veteran actor starred in the comedy series`` Cheers'' and`` Frasier.''

Jim DeMint currently sees his role in the 2012 process, the adviser said, as`` setting the bar high'' for the presidential contenders when it comes to advocating for a small government agenda. He hasn't completely shut the door on running, and if there is a massive void in the group of candidates, who knows what could happen?, said the adviser, who was quick to caution that there is only a five percent chance the senator will run. Veteran Indiana Congressman Mike Pence said: Any increase in the debt ceiling should be married to very real and significant reductions in spending in the short term and the long term.
